title: Feature Request - Multi-user security
author: pb1212
body_snippet:
Currently using via MSSQL DB - would like to be able to restrict visibility and access to Folders and connections based on a login ID.

Thanks

iterations.description: Multi-user security with role-based access control requires a fundamental architectural overhaul of mRemoteNG's single-user connection model and is out of scope for the current roadmap.

comments.author: robertpopa22

notes:
AI triage (claude): Multi-user security with role-based access control requires a fundamental architectural overhaul of mRemoteNG's single-user connection model and is out of scope for the current roadmap.
Approach: No implementation planned; mRemoteNG is designed as a single-user tool. Users needing multi-user access should use network-based credential managers or shared config files with OS-level ACLs.
